text:
Zilda Cardoso (4 January 1936 – 20 December 2019) was a Brazilian actress. She was best known for her many comedic roles in TV shows such as "Praça da Alegria", "A Praça é Nossa" and "Escolinha do Professor Raimundo". She was born in São Paulo.
Cardoso died on 20 December 2019 in her São Paulo apartment of emphysema at the age of 83.
